channel.title: Coeur d'Alene|Kootenai County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Coeur d'Alene|Kootenai County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-95 North - Exit 446
item.description: US-95 north approaching Exit 446 - Brunner Road/Bunco Road. Use Exit 446 for Silverwood theme park.

item.title: US-95 North - Northwest Blvd. West
item.description: US-95 North at Northwest Blvd. West. Use Northwest Blvd. for Post Falls and for I-90 (West). Continue north on US-95 for Sandpoint, Canada and I-90 (East).

item.title: US-95 North - Northwest Blvd. East
item.description: US-95 North at Northwest Blvd to Downtown Coeur d’Alene. Continue north on US-95 for Sandpoint.

item.title: US-95 South at Northwest Blvd.
item.description: US-95 south at Northwest Blvd. to City Center. Continue south on US-95 for Moscow. Northwest Blvd. used to be BL-90.

item.title: US-95 South at I-90
item.description: US-95 south at I-90 west to Post Falls and Spokane. Approaching I-90 east to Kellogg. Continue on US-95 south for Moscow and Lewiston.

item.title: Northwest Blvd. at I-90 West
item.description: Northwest Blvd. west at I-90 west to Post Falls and Spokane.

item.title: Northwest Blvd. at I-90
item.description: Northwest Blvd. west at I-90 east to Kellogg and Missoula. Approaching I-90 west to Post Falls and Spokane.

item.title: US-95 South at Northwest Blvd.
item.description: US-95 south offramp at Northwest Blvd east to City Center and west to Post Falls and Spokane.

item.title: US-95 South at Northwest Blvd.
item.description: US-95 south offramp at Northwest Blvd east to City Center and west to Post Falls and Spokane.

item.title: US-95 South at Northwest Blvd. Exit
item.description: US-95 south at Northwest Blvd. to Post Falls.

item.title: US-95 South at Lincoln Way
item.description: US-95 south approaching Lincoln Way.

item.title: I-90 East - Exits 11 and 12
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 11 - City Center/Northwest Blvd. Approaching Exit 12 - US-95/Sandpoint/Moscow.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 11
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 11 - Northwest Blvd./City Center.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 11
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 11 - Northwest Blvd.

item.title: I-90 West - Exits 12 and 11
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 12 - US-95/Sandpoint/Moscow. Approaching Exit 11 - Northwest Blvd.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 12
item.description: I-90 west approaching Exit 12. Use Exit 12 for US-95 north to Canada.

item.title: I-90 West - Exits 13 and 12
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 13 - 4th St. Approaching Exit 12 - US-95/Sandpoint/Moscow.

item.title: I-90 West - Exits 14 and 13
item.description: I-90 west at Exit 14 - 15th St. Approaching Exit 13 - 4th St.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 15
item.description: I-90 west approaching Exit 15 - City Center/Sherman Ave.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 15
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 15 - Sherman Ave./Fernan.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 14 and 15
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 14 - 15th St. Approaching Exit 15 - Sherman Ave.

item.title: I-90 East - Exits 13 and 14
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 13 - 4th St. Approaching Exit 14 - 15th St.

item.title: US-95 North at I-90 East
item.description: US-95 north at I-90 east to Kellogg. US-95 north continues to Sandpoint, and I-90 west to Spokane.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching I-90
item.description: US-95 north approaching I-90 Exit 12 interchange.

item.title: Jct. I-90 on US-95 North
item.description: US-95 north approaching I-90 jct.

item.title: US-95 South at I-90 East
item.description: US-95 south at I-90 east to Kellogg. US-95 south continues to City Center and Moscow.

item.title: US-95 South at I-90
item.description: US-95 south at I-90 west onramp (Exit 12). Use I-90 west for Post Falls and Spokane. Use I-90 east for Kellogg and US-95 south for Moscow and Lewiston.

item.title: US-95 South Approaching I-90
item.description: US-95 south approaching I-90. For I-90 west to Post Falls and Spokane use right lane.

item.title: BL-90 West at US-95
item.description: BL-90 West at US-95. US-95 north goes through Coeur d’Alene to I-90.

item.title: I-90 Onramp at Exit 17
item.description: I-90 freeway entrance at I-90 Exit 17 - Mullan Trail Road. I-90 east to Missoula and Kellogg, and west to Coeur d’Alene.
